name: todoist-done-list
title: Todoist - Done List
description: Done List is a simple extension that shows your completed Todoist tasks for the day, so you can focus on what you've accomplished, not what you have left.
author: pjtat5

commands.name: done-list
commands.title: Done List
commands.subtitle: See your completed tasks for the day
commands.description: Shows your completed Todoist tasks for the day

preferences.name: todoistApiToken
preferences.title: Todoist API Token
preferences.description: Your Todoist API token (found in Todoist Settings > Integrations > API token)

preferences.name: enableDailyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Enable Daily Task Target
preferences.label: Enable Tasks Target
preferences.description: Show progress towards daily task completion target

preferences.name: dailyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Daily Task Target
preferences.label: Tasks
preferences.description: Number of tasks you aim to complete each day

preferences.name: enableDailyPointsTarget
preferences.title: Enable Daily Points Target
preferences.label: Enable Points Target
preferences.description: Show progress towards daily points completion target

preferences.name: pointsKeyword
preferences.title: Points Keyword
preferences.description: The keyword to look for in labels to identify points (e.g., 'Points:')

preferences.name: dailyPointsTarget
preferences.title: Daily Points Target
preferences.label: Points
preferences.description: Your target number of points to complete each day

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
